Reviews.Title: “Mostly awesome, but a few things you should know”
Reviews.Author: Gloria W
Reviews.Content: people dont bottom line please allow 1 overall hotel pretty deal literally blocks subway stations getting downtown paris takes 10 20 minutes hotel clean kept public kitchen nice cozy clean kept staff helpful except 2 americans privacy posted disturb sign door left dont maid service call sign posted door talked hotel manager apologized told hed talk staff wouldnt credit 20 customer service refused lack customer service common throughout europe fine pushed dont expect customer service america europe provide decent price concept service ours 3 hotel actually alley thats shotty looking dont approached expecting disappointing hotel street somewhat dirty unfriendly hotel nice clean 4 youre book online specials deal 5 dont fooled theyre cool theyre cozy theyre quiet etc 6 lastly policy europe people dont top sheets beds real pain butt americans sleep bottom sheet top sheet comforter bottom sheet comforter sleeping little hot awkward sometimes recommend travel own top sheet seriously youre travel europe stay cheaper hotels

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, friendly staff, good location!”
Reviews.Author: georginarachel
Reviews.Content: fred hotel nice modern decor door bathroom glass hey youve seen youve seen bed super comfy walls soundproofed becuase external noises fantastic staff warm friendly nice safe plenty toiletries hotel located couple minutes walk metro stops paris five ten minutes eat breakfast hotel im perfectly clean checked minutes late mind plenty bars restaurants streets surrounding hotel temperature air con system inside brilliant found hotel bookingcom deal day happily pay prices stay definitely

Reviews.Title: “perfect base for exploring the city”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: wonderful short break paris thanks fred hotel perfect base explore city located lively safe neighbourhood little restaurants sunday market corner metro stations close easy discover paris hotel staff friendly feel home time bring rest family

Reviews.Title: “Chic, chic, chic! Clean, modern, with a lovely staff - a super steal!”
Reviews.Author: Alexis S
Reviews.Content: fantastic clean modern lovely staff super steal lovely cozy fantastic color scheme hotel located 2 blocks metro lines takes sights 20 minutes relaxed visited january budget hotel steal 60 euro night worth double trip stayed hotels 3 times price additional star nearly charming modern staff gracious letting dining meals
